DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to evaluate the success rate, insertion time and complication depending on the use of neuromuscular blocking agent when inserting the laryngeal mask airway (LMA).
DOC.brief_title: Neuromuscular Block in Laryngeal Mask Airway(LMA) Insertion
DOC.criteria: 1870 year american society of anesthesiologist status 12 elective general anesthesia known or predicted difficult airway recent sore throat mouth opening less than 2.5 cm at risk of aspiration
